column3: which was a veggie deep dish with the butter crust (YUM!)
column8: and other toppings. The slices are huge and thick
column9: so between the three of us
column10: we could only eat three slices. We ordered a medium
column11: so we had half a pie leftover (and that was only three slices!). The pizza was so gooey
column13: and the veggies tasted fresh (despite being baked!). There wasn't an overly large amount of watery tomato (which I personally disliked about Zachary's and assumed all deep dish consisted of watery tomato - till now!). In fact
column14: there was no watery tomato at all.
